response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is valued at $800,000 to you. We understand the significance of this item in your endeavors and are confident it will serve as a valuable asset. To make this acquisition more appealing, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its full value. We believe this is a fair and generous offer that reflects the importance of this product in your business or personal pursuits. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 750000}
